content: In the lab of another company, Beyond Meat, scientists re-created a hamburger patty out of proteins from yellow peas, soy and beets for the look of blood.
translations: ita:Nel laboratorio di un'altra azienda, Beyond Meat, gli scienziati hanno ricreato una polpetta di hamburger con proteine d
